languages.text: "Миллионы людей были обязаны ей жизнью. Однако еретики, понимая, что терпят поражение, бросили все остатки сил против корабля с серебряной звездой. Он упал с небес в безвестном мире. Нет точных данных, сколько лет было в этот момент Ардженте. Некоторые хроники даже зовут ее Дитя-Святая, хотя достоверность их сомнительна. В любом случае, она прожила мало... но оставила яркий след. Как падающая звезда".

traits.locale_text: "Миллионы людей были обязаны ей жизнью. Однако еретики, понимая, что терпят поражение, бросили все остатки сил против корабля с серебряной звездой. Он упал с небес в безвестном мире. Нет точных данных, сколько лет было в этот момент Ардженте. Некоторые хроники даже зовут ее Дитя-Святая, хотя достоверность их сомнительна. В любом случае, она прожила мало... но оставила яркий след. Как падающая звезда".
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Millions of people owed their lives to her. But the heretics, having realised their imminent defeat, sent the remnants of their forces after the ship with the silver star. It fell from the skies onto an obscure world. There are no definitive records of how old Argenta was at the time. In some chronicles she's even called the Child Saint, but their credibility is questionable. Either way, she didn't live long... but she left a bright trail in her wake. Like a falling star."
languages.original_text: "Миллионы людей были обязаны ей жизнью. Однако еретики, понимая, что терпят поражение, бросили все остатки сил против корабля с серебряной звездой. Он упал с небес в безвестном мире. Нет точных данных, сколько лет было в этот момент Ардженте. Некоторые хроники даже зовут ее Дитя-Святая, хотя достоверность их сомнительна. В любом случае, она прожила мало... но оставила яркий след. Как падающая звезда".

traits.locale_text: "Millions of people owed their lives to her. But the heretics, having realized their imminent defeat, sent the remnants of their forces after the ship with the silver star. It fell and crashed on an obscure world. There are no definitive records of how old Argenta was at the time. In some chronicles she's even called the Child Saint, but their credibility is questionable. Either way, she didn't live long... but she left a vivid mark. Like a falling star."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

In some chronicles she's even called the Child Saint, but their credibility is questionable. Either way, she didn't live long... but she left a bright trail in her wake. Like a falling star."

In some chronicles she's even called the Child Saint, but their credibility is questionable. Either way, she didn't live long... but she left a bright trail in her wake. Like a falling star."

languages.text: “几百万人感谢她的救命之恩。然而，当那些异端分子意识到他们的阴谋即将破产时，他们派出了所有的残余部队，追杀那艘带着银星印记的飞船。那艘飞船从空中坠落，落到了某个不知名的世界。关于阿洁塔当时的年纪，并没有确切的记录。在一部分编年史中，她甚至被称为童子圣人，不过这些记录的可信度相当值得怀疑。总之，无论怎样，她并没有活得很久……但她就像落入人间的星星一样，留下了一道明亮的轨迹。”
languages.original_text: "Millions of people owed their lives to her. But the heretics, having realised their imminent defeat, sent the remnants of their forces after the ship with the silver star. It fell from the skies onto an obscure world. There are no definitive records of how old Argenta was at the time. In some chronicles she's even called the Child Saint, but their credibility is questionable. Either way, she didn't live long... but she left a bright trail in her wake. Like a falling star."

traits.locale_text: “几百万人感谢她的救命之恩。然而，当那些异端分子意识到他们的阴谋即将破产时，他们派出了所有的残余部队，追杀那艘带着银星印记的飞船。那艘飞船从空中坠落，落到了某个不知名的世界。关于阿洁塔当时的年纪，并没有确切的记录。在一部分编年史中，她甚至被称为童子圣人，不过这些记录的可信度相当值得怀疑。总之，无论怎样，她并没有活得很久……但她就像落入人间的星星一样，留下了一道明亮的轨迹。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.original_text: "Millions of people owed their lives to her. But the heretics, having realised their imminent defeat, sent the remnants of their forces after the ship with the silver star. It fell from the skies onto an obscure world. There are no definitive records of how old Argenta was at the time. In some chronicles she's even called the Child Saint, but their credibility is questionable. Either way, she didn't live long... but she left a bright trail in her wake. Like a falling star."

languages.text: «Millones de personas le debían su vida. Pero los herejes, dándose cuenta de su inminente derrota, enviaron los restos de sus fuerzas contra la nave de la estrella plateada. Cayó de los cielos en un mundo remoto. No hay registros definitivos que indiquen la edad de Argenta en aquel momento. En algunas crónicas se la llama la Niña Santa, pero su credibilidad es dudosa. Sea como fuere, no vivió mucho tiempo... pero dejó una estela brillante como la de una estrella al caer».
languages.original_text: "Millions of people owed their lives to her. But the heretics, having realised their imminent defeat, sent the remnants of their forces after the ship with the silver star. It fell from the skies onto an obscure world. There are no definitive records of how old Argenta was at the time. In some chronicles she's even called the Child Saint, but their credibility is questionable. Either way, she didn't live long... but she left a bright trail in her wake. Like a falling star."

traits.locale_text: «Millones de personas le debían su vida. Pero los herejes, dándose cuenta de su inminente derrota, enviaron los restos de sus fuerzas contra la nave de la estrella plateada. Cayó de los cielos en un mundo remoto. No hay registros definitivos que indiquen la edad de Argenta en aquel momento. En algunas crónicas se la llama la Niña Santa, pero su credibilidad es dudosa. Sea como fuere, no vivió mucho tiempo... pero dejó una estela brillante como la de una estrella al caer».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「何百万人もの人々が彼女のために命を落とした。しかし、異端者たちは敗北を悟り、残党を銀の星を持つ船に送り込んだ。その船は、空から名もなき世界へと落ちた。アルジェンタが何歳だったのか、はっきりした記録はない。ある年代記では、彼女は幼い聖女とさえ呼ばれているが、その信憑性には疑問が残る。いずれにせよ、彼女は長くは生きられなかった…だが、その軌跡には輝かしき足跡を残した。流れ星のように」
languages.original_text: "Millions of people owed their lives to her. But the heretics, having realised their imminent defeat, sent the remnants of their forces after the ship with the silver star. It fell from the skies onto an obscure world. There are no definitive records of how old Argenta was at the time. In some chronicles she's even called the Child Saint, but their credibility is questionable. Either way, she didn't live long... but she left a bright trail in her wake. Like a falling star."

traits.locale_text: 「何百万人もの人々が彼女のために命を落とした。しかし、異端者たちは敗北を悟り、残党を銀の星を持つ船に送り込んだ。その船は、空から名もなき世界へと落ちた。アルジェンタが何歳だったのか、はっきりした記録はない。ある年代記では、彼女は幼い聖女とさえ呼ばれているが、その信憑性には疑問が残る。いずれにせよ、彼女は長くは生きられなかった…だが、その軌跡には輝かしき足跡を残した。流れ星のように」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Millionen von Unschuldigen hatten ihr ihr Leben zu verdanken. Doch die Ketzer hatten erkannt, dass ihre Niederlage bevorsteht, und ließen ihre übrigen Truppen das Schiff mit dem silbernen Stern jagen. Es fiel aus dem Himmel, auf eine obskure Welt. Es gibt keine gesicherten Belege dafür, wie alt Argenta zu dieser Zeit war. In einigen Chroniken wird sie sogar das Heilige Kind genannt, doch deren Glaubwürdigkeit ist zweifelhaft. Wie dem auch sei, sie lebte nicht lange ... Doch sie hinterließ eine Spur aus strahlendem Licht. Wie ein fallender Stern."
languages.original_text: "Millions of people owed their lives to her. But the heretics, having realised their imminent defeat, sent the remnants of their forces after the ship with the silver star. It fell from the skies onto an obscure world. There are no definitive records of how old Argenta was at the time. In some chronicles she's even called the Child Saint, but their credibility is questionable. Either way, she didn't live long... but she left a bright trail in her wake. Like a falling star."

traits.locale_text: "Millionen von Unschuldigen hatten ihr ihr Leben zu verdanken. Doch die Ketzer hatten erkannt, dass ihre Niederlage bevorsteht, und ließen ihre übrigen Truppen das Schiff mit dem silbernen Stern jagen. Es fiel aus dem Himmel, auf eine obskure Welt. Es gibt keine gesicherten Belege dafür, wie alt Argenta zu dieser Zeit war. In einigen Chroniken wird sie sogar das Heilige Kind genannt, doch deren Glaubwürdigkeit ist zweifelhaft. Wie dem auch sei, sie lebte nicht lange ... Doch sie hinterließ eine Spur aus strahlendem Licht. Wie ein fallender Stern."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Des millions de gens ont été sauvés grâce à son action. Mais les hérétiques, sentant leur imminente défaite, ont envoyé le restant de leurs forces attaquer le vaisseau orné de l'étoile argentée. Il est tombé des cieux jusque dans un monde obscur. On ne sait pas avec précision quel âge avait Argenta, à l'époque. Dans certaines chroniques, on la surnomme même la Sainte Enfant, mais leur crédibilité est quelque peu douteuse. Dans tous les cas, elle est morte jeune... mais elle a laissé une trainée étincelante dans son sillage. À la manière d'une étoile filante. »
languages.original_text: "Millions of people owed their lives to her. But the heretics, having realised their imminent defeat, sent the remnants of their forces after the ship with the silver star. It fell from the skies onto an obscure world. There are no definitive records of how old Argenta was at the time. In some chronicles she's even called the Child Saint, but their credibility is questionable. Either way, she didn't live long... but she left a bright trail in her wake. Like a falling star."

traits.locale_text: « Des millions de gens ont été sauvés grâce à son action. Mais les hérétiques, sentant leur imminente défaite, ont envoyé le restant de leurs forces attaquer le vaisseau orné de l'étoile argentée. Il est tombé des cieux jusque dans un monde obscur. On ne sait pas avec précision quel âge avait Argenta, à l'époque. Dans certaines chroniques, on la surnomme même la Sainte Enfant, mais leur crédibilité est quelque peu douteuse. Dans tous les cas, elle est morte jeune... mais elle a laissé une trainée étincelante dans son sillage. À la manière d'une étoile filante. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Canını ona borçlu olan milyonlar varmış. Ufuktaki bozgunu gören kâfirlerse kuvvetlerinin kalan kısmını yıldızlı geminin ardı sıra göndermiş. Gemi, bilinmeyen bir dünyaya düşmüş. Argenta'nın bu olaylar yaşandığında kaç yaşında olduğuna dair kesin bir bilgi yok. Bazı kayıtlarda adı Çocuk Azize diye geçse de bunların ne derece güvenilir olduğu meçhul. Neyse, çok yaşamamış işte... Fakat ardında parlak bir iz bırakmış. Düşen bir yıldız gibi."
languages.original_text: "Millions of people owed their lives to her. But the heretics, having realised their imminent defeat, sent the remnants of their forces after the ship with the silver star. It fell from the skies onto an obscure world. There are no definitive records of how old Argenta was at the time. In some chronicles she's even called the Child Saint, but their credibility is questionable. Either way, she didn't live long... but she left a bright trail in her wake. Like a falling star."

traits.locale_text: "Canını ona borçlu olan milyonlarca kişi varmış. Ama ufuktaki bozgunu gören kâfirler, kuvvetlerinin kalan kısmını yıldızlı geminin ardı sıra göndermişler. Gemi, bilinmeyen bir dünyaya düşmüş. Argenta'nın bu olaylar sırasında kaç yaşında olduğuna dair kesin bir bilgi yok. Bazı kayıtlarda adı Çocuk Azize diye geçiyor ama bunların ne derece güvenilir olduğu meçhul. Neyse, çok yaşamamış işte... Fakat ardında parlak bir iz bırakmış. Düşen bir yıldız gibi."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
